The protection of individuals with regard to the processing of personal data by GSA is based on Regulation (EC) No 45/2001 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 18 December 2000.

The EU General Data Protection Regulation (Regulation (EU) 2016/679 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 27/04/2016) enters into force on May 25, 2018 and sets forth the rules on the protection of natural persons in regards to the processing of personal data and on the free movement of such data (Art. 1, no. 1 of the Regulation).

It is part of our basic policies that we treat the personal data that you make available to us in accordance with law 67/98 and regulation 2016-679 on the protection of individuals with regard to the processing of personal data.
